title: Kuo-Toa Whip
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 16
description | Amphibious. | The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

description | Otherworldly Perception. | The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.
description | Sunlight Sensitivity. | While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
description | Slippery. | The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

description | Spellcasting. | The kuo-toa is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting abil ity is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
description | Cantrips (at will). | sacred flame, thaumaturgy
description | 1st level (3 slots). | bane, shield of faith
description | Multiattack. | The kuo-toa makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its pincer staff.
description | Bite. | Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (ld4 + 2) piercing damage.

description | Pincer Staff. | Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1 d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.
